Hallowed ring is an item that reduces recovery time and prevents damage from failing traps inside the Hallowed Sepulchre. It can be purchased from the Mysterious Hallowed Goods shop for 250 hallowed marks.

The ring also counts as a Saradomin item for the purposes of recharging your run energy at the Magical Obelisks at the end of each floor and as a follower item in God Wars Dungeon.

[[File:Hallowed ring detail.png|left|120px]]
'''Hallowed ring''' is an item that reduces recovery time and prevents damage from failing traps inside the [[Hallowed Sepulchre]]. It can be purchased from the [[Mysterious Hallowed Goods]] shop for 250 [[hallowed mark]]s.

The ring also counts as a Saradomin item for the purposes of recharging your run [[energy]] at the Magical Obelisks at the end of each floor and as a follower item in [[God Wars Dungeon]].
